articles.content: CONNECTICUT Stargazers in Connecticut have a decent chance of seeing Halloween fireballs as the Taurid meteor shower rambles throughout November and the Geminids begin building toward their storied p… [+4492 chars]

articles.author: Keumars Afifi-Sabet
articles.title: Drones could use 'robotic cat's eyes' to track targets more precisely than ever before - Livescience.com
articles.description: A new computer vision system inspired by the design of a feline eye could give future drones and other military robots the ability to track targets in low-visibility and dynamic environments.
articles.content:
A new computer vision system inspired by cats' eyes could enable robots to see the world around them more accurately than ever before.
Robots, drones, self-driving cars and other autonomous systems … [+2950 chars]
